name: Heian Fuuunden
overview: Based on legendary figures in the the Heian period of Japanese history, with a few supernatural embellishments. The game is set specifically in the 10th century.Operating like a standard turn-based RPG outside of combat - the player moves around the overworld map, talks to NPCs in town, characters can level up and change their equipment. In combat, the player can move their characters around on a grid to confront enemy forces, in an order determined by statistics. This mode includes elements of Fire Emblem, such as the risk of permanently losing allied characters if they're allowed to fall in battle.
